name: EXTINCTION EVENT: Elephant
description:
In this game you play as an Elephant attempting to out run the throes of a nefarious Poachers grasp.

See how long you can last with over 49 varying platforms to run through and rad music.

Features:

  • Parallax backgrounds
  • Procedural generation of platforms
  • 49 platforms to run through
  • Banana Collectible
  • Enemy Poacher wanting your ivory tusks
